nodes.text: The KX9 laser cannon was a laser cannon manufactured by the Taim & Bak company. The KX9 laser cannon consisted of four parts; the laser cannon, laser barrel, flashback suppressor, and the laser tip. T-65B X-wing starfighters utilized four KX9 laser cannons, one at the end of each S-foil. The Delta-class T-3c shuttle was equipped with two twin KX-9s.
